Projects Gallery

We share our skills and apply them successfully

Hello, the YanBuild company can make your home much better and more beautiful than it was before. We believe that even the most inconspicuous corner of your room should look perfect. To achieve this, we use the latest technologies and follow modern trends.

  • Using our accumulated experience in the field of laying ceramic tiles, porcelain stoneware, natural stone, installing wooden floors and floor coverings, we will be able to bring the most interesting design solutions into reality. The company's specialists will help you select and combine facing materials for your premises. The YanBuild company guarantees you a good mood after working with our specialists.

Services we Provide

The variety of services will help you find the best approach to the repair and to your needs.

  • Installation

    • • Commercial tile installation
    • • Residential tile installation
    • • Installation of ceramic tiles
    • • Installation of Lamnate
    • • Installation of engineering board
    • • Harwood installation
    • • Lvp installation

  • Special Skills

    • • Bullnose installation
    • • Schluter installation
    • • Installation of heated floors
    • • Installation of decorative tiles
    • • Installation of granite niches and thresholds
    • • Limestone
    • • Installation of wooden steps and thresholds
    • • Thresholds

Our Goal

To Exceed Our Clients' Expectations and Provide Them with Results That Turn Their Dreams into Reality.

Why would you choose us

Why Can You Choose Us? Working with us, you are freed from stress and worry when choosing materials and solving complex technical components. YanBuild company communicates well with its clients at all stages of construction work from the selection of materials to the completion of the project.

    • • Residential tile installation
    • • Installation of engineering board
    • • Lvp installation
    • • Harwood installation
    • • Installation of ceramic tiles
    • • Installation of porcelain tiles
    • • Under Board Installation
    • • Installation of lamnate
    • • Parquet installation
    • • Harwood installation
    • • Installation of vinyl flooring
    • • Installation of engineering board
    • • Installation of rubber coating

Who Choose YanBuild?

YanBuild caters to discerning clients who prioritize professionalism and excellence in their home remodeling projects. Our services are tailored for those seeking a seamless renovation experience and aspire to elevate their homes to new heights of sophistication and quality.

Let’s Work Together!

The company YanBuild specializes in providing a wide range of remodeling and reconstruction services. Our company takes pride in its professionalism and experience, which allows us to provide our clients with high-quality and reliable services.
We offer a full range of repair and construction works, starting from consultations and design to the final completion of all necessary tasks. Whether you need cosmetic repairs or a complete reconstruction, our team is ready to bring your ideas and wishes to life.

Request a FREE estimate quote today

If you're ready to elevate your home with YanBuild's professional remodeling services, don't hesitate to request your free estimate today. Simply fill out your information on our website or contact us directly, and our team will be delighted to assist you in bringing your vision to life.
